description: American Creek Resources Ltd., a junior exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds a 20% interest in the Treaty Creek project covering an area of 114 square kilometers located in the Skeena Mining District of northern British Columbia; and 100% interest in the Austruck-Bonanza project located in British Columbia. American Creek Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Cardston, Canada.
